name: projeto-livraria
description: Sistema completo de livraria com frontend, admin e backend

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../e2e && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.start:admin: cd admin && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.build:all: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: cd backend && Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; cd ../frontend && Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; cd ../admin && Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; cd ../e2e && Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
scripts.lint:all: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../admin && npm run lint
